attributes.action: Stop the Megga Mosque being built in London, this community is a minority group and as such should be considered in that light.  Why are we bending over backwards to appease the religeon of Islam, who's followers persecute christians throughout the globe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even in our own country if one converts to christianity they are hounded and persecuted by their own families, even suffering physical assualt.  Women are kept under and are not allowed the same freedom that western women enjoy. Mosques have been hotbeds for terrorist and radicalisation of young Muslims so why build more.  Churches are open for anyone to attend, but Mosques are closed off to the british public. It will be interesting to know how much the British Tax payer is paying towards this.  If one wanted to build a large church in this area would planning permiion be given?
